Login.Title: Login
Login.Summary: As a user, I want to be able to access my account to manage my orders, view my wishlist, and update my account information.
Login.Description: The login feature allows users to access their accounts on the e-commerce website. This feature is essential for users to manage their orders, view their wishlist, update their account information, and perform other account-related tasks.
Login.Acceptance: The login feature is considered complete when a user can successfully enter their credentials and access their account.

Registration.Title: Registration
Registration.Summary: As a user, I want to be able to create an account on the website so that I can access my account information, save products to my wishlist, and make purchases.
Registration.Description: The registration process should be simple and straightforward, requiring only essential information such as name, email address, and password. The user should be able to choose a username and password that they can easily remember. Once registered, the user should be able to access their account information, including their profile, address, and orders.
Registration.Acceptance:
The user story will be considered complete when the following acceptance criteria are met:
1. The user can successfully create an account on the website.
2. The user can access their account information, including their profile, address, and orders.
3. The user can save products to their wishlist.
4. The user can make purchases on the website.

Product Search.Title: Product Search
Product Search.Summary: As a user, I want to be able to search for products on the website.
Product Search.Description: The product search feature should allow users to search for products by keyword, category, or filter. The search results should be displayed in a list format, with each product listing including the product name, image, price, and a brief description.
Product Search.Acceptance:
The product search feature is considered complete when it meets the following criteria:
- Users can search for products by keyword, category, or filter.
- The search results are displayed in a list format, with each product listing including the product name, image, price, and a brief description.

Product Listing.Title: Product Listing
Product Listing.Summary: As a user, I want to be able to browse and search for products on the website.
Product Listing.Description: The product listing page should allow users to search for products by keyword, category, or filter. The results should be displayed in a clear and concise manner, with relevant information such as product name, description, price, and availability.
Product Listing.Acceptance:
The user story will be considered complete when the following criteria are met:
- The product listing page is accessible from the homepage.
- Users can search for products by keyword, category, or filter.
- The search results are displayed in a clear and concise manner.
- The product listing page includes relevant information such as product name, description, price, and availability.

Product Details.Title: Product Details Page
Product Details.Summary: As a user, I want to view detailed information about a specific product, including its description, price, and availability.
Product Details.Description: The product details page should provide users with all the necessary information to make an informed decision about whether to purchase a product. This includes the product's name, description, price, availability, and any other relevant details such as size, color, or materials. The page should also include high-quality images of the product from different angles to give users a clear understanding of what they are buying.
Product Details.Acceptance:
The user story will be considered complete when the following acceptance criteria are met:
- The product details page is accessible from the product listing page.
- The product details page displays the product's name, description, price, availability, and images.
- The product details page allows users to add the product to their cart.

Wishlist.Title: Wishlist
Wishlist.Summary: As a user, I want to be able to save products I'm interested in for later purchase.
Wishlist.Description: The wishlist feature allows users to create a list of products they are interested in purchasing in the future. This feature provides a convenient way for users to keep track of products they may want to buy without having to add them to their shopping cart immediately. The wishlist can be accessed from the user's account page and can be shared with others.
Wishlist.Acceptance:
The wishlist feature is considered complete when the following criteria are met:
- Users can create a wishlist and add products to it.
- Users can view and manage their wishlist from their account page.
- Users can share their wishlist with others.

Shopping Cart.Title: Shopping Cart
Shopping Cart.Summary: As a user, I want to be able to add products to my shopping cart so that I can purchase them later.
Shopping Cart.Description: The shopping cart should allow users to add products to it, remove products from it, and view the total cost of the products in the cart. The shopping cart should also be persistent across sessions so that users can come back and complete their purchase later.
Shopping Cart.Acceptance:
The user story will be considered complete when the following acceptance criteria are met:
- The user can add products to the shopping cart.
- The user can remove products from the shopping cart.
- The user can view the total cost of the products in the cart.
- The shopping cart is persistent across sessions.

Checkout & Payment.Title: Checkout & Payment
Checkout & Payment.Summary: As a user, I want to be able to complete my purchase and make payment.
Checkout & Payment.Description: This user story covers the functionality for users to complete their purchase and make payment on the e-commerce website. It includes the ability to review their shopping cart, select a payment method, and provide necessary payment information to complete the transaction.
Checkout & Payment.Acceptance:
The user story is considered complete when the following criteria are met:
- The user can successfully complete their purchase and make payment.
- The payment information is securely processed and the order is confirmed.

Social Media Sharing.Title: Social Media Sharing
Social Media Sharing.Summary: As a user, I want to be able to share products on social media to promote them to my friends and followers.
Social Media Sharing.Description: This feature will allow users to easily share products they are interested in on social media platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram. By sharing products, users can generate buzz and interest in the products, potentially leading to increased sales and brand awareness.
Social Media Sharing.Acceptance: The user story will be considered complete when users are able to share products on social media platforms using the provided sharing buttons or links.

My Account.Title: My Account
My Account.Summary: As a user, I want to manage my account information, including my profile, address, and orders.
My Account.Description: This user story covers the functionality for users to manage their account information. This includes the ability to view and edit their profile, update their address, and view their past orders. This functionality is important because it allows users to keep their account information up to date and easily access their order history.
My Account.Acceptance:
The user story will be considered complete when the following acceptance criteria are met:
- The user can view their profile information, including their name, email address, and profile picture.
- The user can edit their profile information, including their name, email address, and profile picture.
- The user can update their address.
- The user can view their past orders, including the order date, order number, and order status.
My Account.Labels/Tags: account management, user profile, order history

Ratings & Reviews.Title: Ratings & Reviews
Ratings & Reviews.Summary: As a user, I want to be able to rate and review products to share my experiences and help others make informed decisions.
Ratings & Reviews.Description: This feature will allow users to provide feedback on products they have purchased, helping other users make informed decisions about their purchases. Users should be able to rate products on a scale of 1 to 5 stars and write reviews sharing their thoughts and experiences. The ratings and reviews should be displayed on the product pages to provide potential customers with valuable insights.
Ratings & Reviews.Acceptance:
The user story will be considered complete when the following acceptance criteria are met:
1. Users can rate products on a scale of 1 to 5 stars.
2. Users can write reviews sharing their thoughts and experiences.
3. The ratings and reviews are displayed on the product pages.

Order History.Title: Order History
Order History.Summary: As a user, I want to view my past orders to track their status, review details, and access order-related information.
Order History.Description:
The Order History feature allows users to access a chronological list of their past orders. This provides them with a convenient way to:
- Track the status of their orders, including whether they are in progress, shipped, or delivered.
- Review order details, such as the products purchased, quantities, and total cost.
- Access order-related information, such as invoices, tracking numbers, and estimated delivery dates.
- Reorder products from previous orders easily.
Order History.Acceptance:
The Order History feature is considered complete when:
- Users can access a list of their past orders.
- Order details, including product information, quantities, and total cost, are displayed accurately.
- Order status is updated in real-time and reflects the current stage of the order fulfillment process.
- Users can access order-related information, such as invoices and tracking numbers.

Contact Support.Title: Contact Support
Contact Support.Summary: As a user, I want to be able to contact customer support for assistance with any issues or inquiries I may have.
Contact Support.Description: This user story covers the functionality for users to contact customer support through various channels, such as email, phone, or live chat. The support team should be able to respond promptly and provide helpful assistance to resolve user queries or issues.
Contact Support.Acceptance:
The user story is considered complete when the following criteria are met:
- Users can easily access contact information for customer support through multiple channels.
- The support team responds to user inquiries within a reasonable timeframe.
- The support team provides helpful and effective assistance to resolve user issues or queries.

Dashboard.Title: Dashboard
Dashboard.Summary: As an administrator, I want to have a dashboard that provides an overview of the website's performance.
Dashboard.Description: The dashboard should include metrics such as the number of active users, products, and orders. This information will help me to understand how the website is performing and identify areas for improvement.
Dashboard.Acceptance:
The dashboard is accessible from the admin panel and displays the following metrics:
- Number of active users
- Number of products
- Number of orders

Buyers Management.Title: Buyers Management
Buyers Management.Summary: As an administrator, I want to manage user accounts, including adding, editing, and deleting users.
Buyers Management.Description: This user story covers the functionality for managing user accounts in the Ecommerce Website. As an administrator, I should be able to add new users, edit existing user information, and delete users as needed. This will allow me to maintain the accuracy and security of the user database and ensure that only authorized users have access to the website.
Buyers Management.Acceptance:
The user story will be considered complete when the following acceptance criteria are met:
1. I can add a new user by providing their name, email address, and password.
2. I can edit an existing user's information, including their name, email address, and password.
3. I can delete a user from the system.

Orders Management.Title: Orders Management
Orders Management.Summary: As an administrator, I want to manage orders, including viewing, editing, and updating their status.
Orders Management.Description: The Orders Management component allows administrators to manage orders placed by users on the e-commerce website. This includes the ability to view order details, edit order information, and update the status of orders (e.g., processing, shipped, delivered, canceled). This functionality is essential for efficient order fulfillment and customer service.
Orders Management.Acceptance:
The Orders Management component should meet the following acceptance criteria:
- Administrators can view a list of all orders placed on the website.
- Administrators can view the details of each order, including the products ordered, the customer information, and the order status.
- Administrators can edit order information, such as the shipping address or payment method.
- Administrators can update the status of orders to reflect their current stage in the fulfillment process.

Product Categories Management.Title: Product Categories Management
Product Categories Management.Summary: As an administrator, I want to manage product categories and subcategories to organize and categorize products effectively.
Product Categories Management.Description: The Product Categories Management component allows administrators to create, edit, and delete product categories and subcategories. This is important for organizing and categorizing products in a logical and user-friendly manner, making it easier for customers to find and browse products that meet their needs.
Product Categories Management.Acceptance:
The user story is considered complete when the following criteria are met:
- Administrators can create new product categories and subcategories.
- Administrators can edit existing product categories and subcategories.
- Administrators can delete product categories and subcategories.
- Product categories and subcategories are displayed correctly on the website.

Products Management.Title: Manage Products
Products Management.Summary: As an administrator, I want to be able to manage products, including adding, editing, and deleting them.
Products Management.Description: This user story covers the functionality for administrators to manage products on the e-commerce website. It includes the ability to add new products, edit existing products, and delete products that are no longer available or relevant. The administrator should be able to provide details such as product name, description, price, and availability.
Products Management.Acceptance:
The user story will be considered complete when the administrator can successfully perform the following tasks:
- Add a new product with all required details
- Edit an existing product's details
- Delete a product from the website

Payment Management.Title: Payment Management
Payment Management.Summary: As an administrator, I want to manage payment information, including bank account details.
Payment Management.Description: This user story covers the functionality for administrators to manage payment information for the e-commerce website. This includes the ability to add, edit, and delete bank account details, as well as manage other payment-related settings. This functionality is essential for ensuring that the website can process payments securely and efficiently.
Payment Management.Acceptance:
The user story will be considered complete when the following acceptance criteria are met:
- Administrators can add, edit, and delete bank account details.
- Administrators can manage other payment-related settings, such as payment gateways and currency options.
- The website can process payments securely and efficiently using the managed payment information.

Ratings & Review.Title: Ratings & Reviews
Ratings & Review.Summary: As a user, I want to be able to rate and review products to share my experiences and help others make informed decisions.
Ratings & Review.Description: This feature will allow users to provide feedback on products they have purchased, helping other users make informed decisions about their purchases. Users should be able to rate products on a scale of 1 to 5 stars and write reviews sharing their thoughts and experiences. The ratings and reviews should be displayed on the product pages to provide potential customers with valuable insights.
Ratings & Review.Acceptance:
The user story will be considered complete when the following acceptance criteria are met:
1. Users can rate products on a scale of 1 to 5 stars.
2. Users can write reviews sharing their thoughts and experiences.
3. The ratings and reviews are displayed on the product pages.

Statistics & Reports.Title: View Statistics and Reports
Statistics & Reports.Summary: As an administrator, I want to view statistics and reports on website performance to gain insights and make informed decisions.
Statistics & Reports.Description: The administrator should be able to access a dashboard that provides an overview of key metrics such as the number of active users, products, orders, revenue generated, and other relevant data. This information will help the administrator understand the website's performance, identify areas for improvement, and make data-driven decisions to optimize the website's operations.
Statistics & Reports.Acceptance: The user story is considered complete when the administrator can successfully access the dashboard and view the statistics and reports.

System Users Management.Title: System Users Management
System Users Management.Summary: As an administrator, I want to manage system users, including creating, editing, and deleting them.
System Users Management.Description: This user story covers the functionality for managing system users within the e-commerce website. Administrators should be able to create new users, edit existing user information, and delete users as needed. This includes managing user roles and permissions to ensure appropriate access levels and security within the system.
System Users Management.Acceptance:
Acceptance criteria:
- Administrators can create new system users with specified roles and permissions.
- Administrators can edit existing user information, including their roles and permissions.
- Administrators can delete system users when necessary.

Roles Management.Title: Roles Management
Roles Management.Summary: As an administrator, I want to manage user roles and permissions to control access to different features and functions of the website.
Roles Management.Description: The Roles Management component allows administrators to create, edit, and delete user roles. Each role can be assigned specific permissions, such as the ability to add products, manage orders, or view reports. This level of control ensures that users only have access to the functionality they need to perform their tasks effectively.
Roles Management.Acceptance:
The user story is considered complete when the following criteria are met:
- Administrators can create, edit, and delete user roles.
- Administrators can assign specific permissions to each role.
- Users are only granted access to the functionality that corresponds to their assigned roles.

CMS Management.Title: CMS Management
CMS Management.Summary: As an administrator, I want to be able to edit content for CMS pages, such as the About Us and Contact Us pages.
CMS Management.Description: This will allow me to keep the website's content up-to-date and accurate, and to make changes to the website's design and layout as needed.
CMS Management.Acceptance: The user story will be considered complete when the administrator can successfully edit content for CMS pages, and the changes are reflected on the live website.

Email Management.Title: Email Management
Email Management.Summary: As an administrator, I want to manage email content sent to users.
Email Management.Description: This user story involves managing the content of emails sent to users, including adding, editing, and deleting email templates. The ability to customize email content is crucial for effective communication with users, allowing administrators to tailor messages for different purposes, such as order confirmations, promotional campaigns, and customer support inquiries.
Email Management.Acceptance: The user story is considered complete when administrators can successfully add, edit, and delete email templates, and the updated content is reflected in emails sent to users.

Complaints/Feedbacks.Title: View and respond to user queries, complaints, and feedback
Complaints/Feedbacks.Summary: As an administrator, I want to be able to view and respond to user queries, complaints, and feedback to ensure customer satisfaction and address any issues promptly.
Complaints/Feedbacks.Description:
This user story involves creating a dedicated platform or interface within the admin dashboard that allows administrators to view and manage all user queries, complaints, and feedback received through various channels such as email, contact forms, or social media. The platform should provide the ability to:
- View a list of all queries, complaints, and feedback, including the user's contact information, the nature of the inquiry, and any attachments or supporting documentation.
- Filter and search queries, complaints, and feedback based on specific criteria such as date range, user, or keyword to easily locate and prioritize responses.
- Assign queries, complaints, and feedback to specific team members or departments for handling and resolution.
- Track the status of each query, complaint, or feedback, including whether it has been acknowledged, responded to, or resolved.
- Compose and send personalized responses to users, providing updates, resolutions, or additional information as needed.
- Generate reports on the volume and nature of queries, complaints, and feedback received to identify trends and areas for improvement in customer service.
Complaints/Feedbacks.Acceptance:
The user story will be considered complete when the following acceptance criteria are met:
- A dedicated platform or interface is created within the admin dashboard for viewing and managing user queries, complaints, and feedback.
- The platform allows administrators to view a list of all queries, complaints, and feedback, filter and search them, and assign them to specific team members or departments.
- Administrators can track the status of each query, complaint, or feedback and compose and send personalized responses to users.
- Reports can be generated on the volume and nature of queries, complaints, and feedback received.
Complaints/Feedbacks.Labels/Tags: Customer Service, Feedback Management, User Queries
